items.raw_desc: Egykezes láncfűrész Riwall PRO RPCS 2526, 25 ccm:The Riwall PRO RPCS 2526 single-handed petrol saw with a cutting bar length of 26 cm is a handy tool for branching and pruning trees or for cutting narrower trunks for firewood.
